english.segment1: Sometimes it's sink or swim. And I've been treading water. I should have expected the flood. But floating never has been easy for me. You caught me carefree. And You called me like You saw me: a sinner
english.segment2: And I said five wits, looks, and strength. I don't think are much in the way of companions. And good deeds couldn't pay my account. Not kinsmen nor knowledge stand. The trial of every man. Don't call me every man
english.segment3: Call me Christian. (I am in You, You are in me, I am in You). Call me Christian. (I am in You, You are in me, I am in You). Call me Christian
english.segment4: I've looked on the evergreen. And I've seen it constantly grow and show us life. And I want to live eternally. I want to be an imitation of Christ. I want to be a little Christ
english.segment5: As a boy I'd put my steps. In my brother's bigger tracks. To match his stride. And just like that I follow Jesus. Jesus is my guide.
